fill_all_fields: Please fill in all fields before adding the customer.
customers_details: Select a client to see their details.
instructions_body: Fill in the fields and tap "Add" to create a new customer. Tap on a customer to view their full details. In the detail view, you can Update, Delete, or Close the customer panel. Your data is saved securely in a local database. Tap the üè† house icon to return to the main page. Use the ‚ùì help icon to toggle these instructions.
